parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the bastion host for which you want to configure a whitelist of public IP addresses.

> You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the bastion host ID.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the bastion host.

parameters.name: WhiteList
parameters.description: The IP address whitelist that you want to configure.
